data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gilasian, Ebrahim, Ziegler, Joachim, Parchami-Araghi, Mehrdad (2018): Review of the genus Trichactia Stein (Diptera: Tachinidae) in the Palaearctic Region, with the description of a new species from Iran and the East Mediterranean. Zootaxa 4526 (2): 207-220, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4526.2.6|19 occurrences
